definition: same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
lit. standing in front of the King of Hell is easy, but smaller devils are difficult to deal with (idiom)
pinyin: Yan2 wang2 hao3 jian4 , xiao3 gui3 nan2 dang1

sentences.english: Yet Yama keeps me outside the gate.
There is a court there, presided over by the King of Hell.
sentences.chinese: 那里有一个法庭，由阎王管理。

sentences.english: One of the four kings of Hades, of which the eastern part falls to his share.
sentences.chinese: 四大天王之一的阎王，其中东部属于自己的份额。

sentences.english: The skill of the disease could save lives, book in hand.
sentences.chinese: 得这种病的人能否保住性命，生杀大权在阎王爷手中。

sentences.english: Not long after the warden deprived us of his company, I got a postcard in the mail.
sentences.chinese: 监狱长见阎王之后不久，我收到一张明信片。

sentences.english: Dedicated to the God of Hades, it's haunted with Buddhist demons and devils;
sentences.chinese: 在这座为了阎王修建的庙宇里充满了鬼怪恶魔的神像。

sentences.english: Yama said, I have seventy-year-old life.
sentences.chinese: 阎王说，我的寿命有七十八岁。

sentences.english: Yan Wang is normally depicted wearing a Chinese judge's cap and sometimes appears on Chinese Hell Bank Notes.
sentences.chinese: 阎王通常戴着一顶乌纱帽，纸钱上也会有他的形象。

sentences.english: He'll lie with a straight face till kingdom comes.
sentences.chinese: 就是在阎王爷面前，他撒谎也不会脸红。

definition: Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
magistrate (during Tang and Song dynasties)/mythological underworld judge
Two deities, one short, one tall, chained together at the ankle, responsible for rewarding the good and punishing the bad
old variant of 豐都|丰都[Feng1 du1]/Fengdu county Chongqing municipality/name of a famous necropolis
celestial soldier/(old) imperial troops/(Tw, jocular) clumsy army recruit/(more generally) bungler/screw-up
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
